main event: An unidentified object was observed in the sky over Richardson, Texas on April 26, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as reddish orange to whitish and about the size of a cigarette., It moved at a high rate of speed for 2-3 seconds before the light flickered out., Witnesses reported the object was possibly under intelligent control., The sighting lasted for approximately 4-5 minutes., No photographs or physical evidence were collected from the observation.
witness description: The witness was a 37-year-old electronics salesman with a commercial pilot license.
